org.apache.cocoon.generation
Class SessionAttributeGenerator

java.lang.Object
  org.apache.cocoon.util.AbstractLogEnabled
      org.apache.cocoon.xml.AbstractXMLProducer
          org.apache.cocoon.generation.AbstractGenerator
              org.apache.cocoon.generation.SessionAttributeGenerator
All Implemented Interfaces:
org.apache.cocoon.generation.Generator, Poolable, Recyclable, org.apache.cocoon.sitemap.SitemapModelComponent, org.apache.cocoon.xml.XMLProducer
public class SessionAttributeGenerator
extends org.apache.cocoon.generation.AbstractGenerator

Generates a document from a session attribute. Generates a document from a session attribute. The attribute may be a DOM node, an XMLizable, or any other object, and is streamed using the same rules as for <xsp:expr> in XSPs (see org.apache.cocoon.components.language.markup.xsp.XSPObjectHelper).

Name of the session attribute is specified using src attribute of the generate tag, or, if no src tag present, using attr-name parameter.

This generator has 2 parameters:

  • attr-name : the session attribute name (mandatory if no src attribute specified).
  • root-element (optional) : the name of the root element of the produced document. This parameter is optional if the session attribute is a DOM or an XMLizable.

Example usage : 

   <map:generator name="session-attr" logger="sitemap.generator.session-attr"
     src="org.apache.cocoon.generation.SessionAttributeGenerator"/>
   ...
   <map:generate type="session-attr">
     <map:parameter name="attr-name" value="myAttribute"/>
     <map:parameter name="root-element" value="root"/>
   </map:generate>

Version:
$Id: SessionAttributeGenerator.java 605605 2007-12-19 16:19:51Z vgritsenko $
See Also:
ReadDOMSessionTransformer, WriteDOMSessionTransformer
